Title: HOT TIN ROOF: THE CAT THAT WORE A FEDORA
Genre: Adventure - Action - Detective-mystery
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: February 20, 2015
Size: 67.5 MB
Company: Glass Bottom Games / Glass Bottom Games
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/hot_tin_roof_the_cat_that_wore_a_fedora

About:
YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re the Private Investigator on a string of grisly murders, scouring for clues in a 3D side-scrolling world. Grab your fedora and revolver - in Hot Tin Roof youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re on the case! Dive into a noir mystery and become Emma Jones, the only PI partnered to a cat named Franky.
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a dog eat dog world out there, but luckily? A cat has your back. Franky. The cat that wore a fedora.
Noir as heck.
Metroidvania meets Adventure Game in a side-scrolling 3D world, with tons of platforming and exploration
4 distinct plot threads, with 15 different resolutions.
Instead of acquiring abilities, you find new revolver rounds, which you load into your revolver yourself. Combine them in unique ways!
Scour the world for clues! Use them in conversations to unlock secrets, solve murders and more.
Cats. More cats than you could shake a cat at. Also, pigeons and rats. Many wearing tiny hats.
Spiffy chip noir jazz soundtrack.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Intel or 2.8GHz AMD 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: ATI Radeon X1600 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better (256MB graphics memory or more. Shader Model 3.0 needs to be supported). 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 500 MB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
